fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Make one of your Simps attack a player at night.
- Roleblock a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player converted to a Simp will have their goal turned into yours.
- A Simp keeps all their previous role's abilities and attributes but their role will be revealed as Simp when killed or investigated.
- A Simp that's been made to attack a player for you can still perform their night action as well.
- You start with 3 randomly selected Simps.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eradicate everyone who isn't a Simp.
